text: Tsey khto disbelieve skazaly, "My ne budemo viryty v tse Quran, ne u poperednikh svyatykh pysanni." Yakshcho vy mohly til聞ky peredbachyty tsykh porushnykiv koly vony stoyat聞 pered tym, yak yikhniy Lord! Vony budut聞 sperechatysya z odyn odnym spyna ta vpered. Poslidovnyky kazhut聞 yikhnim lideram, "Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya vas, my by viruyuchi
